The purpose Collaborative Care Older Adults Back Pain ( COCOA ) Clinical Trial evaluate clinical effectiveness feasibility collaborative care model ( medical chiropractic care ) pragmatic , prospective pilot trial conduct 120 old adult age 65 low back pain least 1 month duration . Participants randomize 3-parallel treatment arm : ) conventional medical care ( MED CARE ) , b ) unlinked conventional medical chiropractic care ( DUAL CARE ) , c ) co-management model include conventional medical chiropractic care ( SHARED CARE ) . Participants three group receive 12 week usual back pain treatment medical doctor doctor osteopathy ( MD/DO ) Genesis Family Medical Center . Participants two treatment group additionally receive 12 week usual chiropractic care back pain doctor chiropractic Palmer Research Clinic .
